title: Can't use any abilities or anything while not also being able to move around but everythingelsefine
body: Hey if someone can help me my games have been i think lag where the ms is rising and dropping only by a few numbers but in game it like freezes and i cant do anything all the comands i use like ablities or even simple clicking won't gothrough until like 5 seconds later. If any solutions please let me know also when i start my first game of the day it blocks me out and says can't connect try to reconnect but it doesn't work so i have to restart my computer and even shut it down fully then start it up again. if solutions point them out.

replies.body:
I have had this issue before, but thankfully Riot has a wonderful Connection KB that should fix your issue. Make sure you follow it and should resolve your problem: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
